extendedInfo.description: Welcome to CLUB SLO-MO for WIDESCREEN TABLET! (Phone version is in our other apps)You are VIP. Relax and take a psychedelic hit of SLO-MO, the drug of the future!  Inspired by the film DREDD 3D. HD QUALITY, AD FREE, LIVE WALLPAPER. Take a trip as the psychedelic colors of the night club party change and a POV hand comes out with a smokey hit of the juice waiting for you. The ink-like drug mixes hypnotically in slow motion like in the film, and a burst of smoke trails from the mouthpiece as it's taken away.  When the smoke clears it repeats.  A beautiful movie like POV hit of SLO-MO anytime you like, in HD! Please Enjoy Responsibly ;)Will not drain your battery or slow your tablet. This is a LIVE WALLPAPER. After installing, select it from the live wallpapers menu.Features: -SPEED CONTROL (Go from FAST to Super Slowww Motion)-CHOOSE to TAKE A HIT only when you touch the screen! **THIS IS A WIDESCREEN TABLET VERSION- FOR REGULAR PHONE VERSION PLEASE SEE OUR OTHER APPS**
